TTRamp Class Reference

TTRamp is an audio processor that provides a soft saturation or overdrive effect to "warm" a sound up. More...

TTSymbol & attrMode
 mode: sample_accurate or vector_accurate
TTFloat64 attrRampTime
 ramp time in milliseconds
TTUInt32 rampSamples
 ramp time in samples
TTBoolean direction
 0 = ramp up, 1 = ramp down

Detailed Description

TTRamp is an audio processor that provides a soft saturation or overdrive effect to "warm" a sound up.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

TTErr TTRamp::setMode ( const TTValue &  value  )  [private]

Setter for the mode attribute.

The options are 'sample' and 'vector' which determine the desired accuracy of the ramp that is generated.

TTErr TTRamp::stop (  )  [private]

Stop the current ramp.
